q: Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 White House race.`` I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified,'' he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either. Crown Prosecution Service said it would re-examine material collected by police officers who investigated allegations that journalists at the newspaper illegally accessed the voicemail of several public figures. Keir Starmer , the Director of Public Prosecutions, announced a comprehensive assessment of all material in the possession of the Metropolitan Police Service relating to phone hacking. The allegations concern the behaviour of journalists during the time that Mr Andy Coulson was editor of the newspaper. will be back on Curb Your Enthusiasm when the Larry David Letterman comedy starts its eighth season on HBO in June. Here's a funny story about Lewis and David Letterman from nearly 40 years ago. After I made my first appearance on the Johnny Carson show in, like, 1974, Larry and I went shopping in Macy's. He kept following me about five steps behind, humming the Tonight Show theme really loud and pointing at me. Naturally, we got thrown out of Macy's for him doing that. It was nice of him.
